source_id: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_008_chunk1
evidence_span: Six different hydride morphologies were prepared. Four of these were prepared on flat strips produced from rings of tube that were manually straightened and stress relieved for 40 h at 400°C
process_step: manually straightened and stress relieved for 40 h at 400°C

extra_properties.hydriding_conditions: electrolytically deposited in 0.1M H₂SO₄ at 90°C, 100 mA/cm²
